testimonial.title: Projects (CASE STUDIES)
testimonial.subtitle: Selected Projects
testimonial.text1: Development of a plant-material extraction method aimed at isolating a thermolabile compound for the cosmetics industry. Preparation and optimisation of the process to obtain a product with a minimum purity of 95%.
testimonial.text2: We developed one of the stages of the synthesis and purification of a biologically active compound, optimised it, and improved the overall yield of the entire 5-step process by 12 pp.
about.title: Our Motivation
about.text1: LubTech is a team of professionals experienced in developing and implementing technologies for the chemical and related industries. Our goal is to combine scientific knowledge with industrial practice to create solutions that genuinely increase process efficiency and safety.
about.text2: Our team can be described with one word: balance. We combine youth and maturity, calmness and experience, ambition and constant effort. Among us are members with over 10 years of academic experience, more than 20 years in industry, as well as aspiring young specialists who are already significantly experienced. The result of combining such ‘substrates’ is a team whose ambition is to deliver solutions for Polish industry while continuously developing, learning, and expanding horizons.
about.text3: We are the type of people who close things — although we enjoy the journey itself, we always finish what we start. Solving many problems has allowed us to refine a working scheme that consistently delivers excellent results. If you are not yet using our services, try applying our scheme to your own challenge: we dive into the topic, test hypotheses, guide the solution and design the project, confirm assumptions during scaling, and implement the final process.
services.title: LubTech Competence Map
services.subtitle: See how we combine scientific knowledge, process technology, and engineering in practice.
services.processes_desc:
We prepare pathways for organic and inorganic synthesis,
We optimize parameters to increase yield and product purity,
We design multi-step and integrated processes,
We perform multicomponent separations: purification on preparative chromatographic columns, cooling crystallization, sublimation, LLE, SLE, SFE, Soxhlet extraction, fractional distillation, azeotropic distillation, vacuum distillation, steam distillation, hydrodistillation, as well as solvent drying and recovery.
services.solutions_desc:
We prepare conceptual and technological designs of equipment,
We design complete industrial production lines,
We design chemical production halls,
We select materials and operating parameters,
We prepare PFD and P&ID process diagrams,
We advise on modernization, implementation, and commissioning of production lines designed by us,
We support obtaining environmental permits.
services.formulations_desc:
For the cosmetics, pharmaceutical, fertilizer, and feed industries,
We develop and optimize formulations based on client guidelines,
We perform stability and compatibility tests,
We develop manufacturing technologies and prepare technological documentation.
services.rd_desc:
We prepare and guide teams through literature reviews,
We offer research and support for scientific projects, grant proposals, and expert panels,
We perform analyses and reports: GCMS, 1H, 13C NMR, PSD.
